From: Internal News <internalnews@onechalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-07-04 14:57
Subject: Organisational Change Announcement | Tawreed Hub
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/6f4c12972d51bec383a13925750b98c61908646366.png> 	

We are pleased to announce the appointment of Omar Zaouiri as General Manager – Tawreed Hub Services, KSA, effective January 2026, reporting jointly to our Chief Operating Officer, Andreu Marco, and to Mohamed Al Dabbagh, Managing Director, KSA.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/33dd18e0167a55be26c78b18b8833963634584832.png> 	

In his new role, Omar will co-lead the operation alongside Elmehdi Tahabouamri, VP of Logistics, with a focus on establishing the operational foundation and ensuring the full readiness of the Tawreed Hub in Riyadh. He will play a key role in driving the setup phase, supporting critical workstreams to enable a smooth transition and sustained business continuity.

chunks.text:
In his new role, Omar will co-lead the operation alongside Elmehdi Tahabouamri, VP of Logistics, with a focus on establishing the operational foundation and ensuring the full readiness of the Tawreed Hub in Riyadh. He will play a key role in driving the setup phase, supporting critical workstreams to enable a smooth transition and sustained business continuity.

In the interim, Omar will continue supporting the Country Management team in KSA, contributing to key strategic and operational initiatives across the market, while also supporting priority initiatives to ensure alignment and momentum ahead of the launch of Tawreed in January.

Please join us in congratulating Omar on this new chapter and in wishing him every success in his upcoming role.

For inquiries and to share your news in the Internal News please contact rasha.nashashibi@chalhoub.com <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1443&user=10620>  

Copyright © 2025 Chalhoub Group. All rights reserved.

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/newsletter-open.php?nli=311&user=10620>
